Accuracy.description: The extent to which the solution is correct and free from errors.

Completeness.description: The extent to which the solution covers all required steps and considerations.

Clarity.description: The extent to which the solution is well-explained, easy to understand, and well-organized.

Efficiency.description: The extent to which the solution uses an optimal approach and minimizes unnecessary calculations.

Appropriateness.description: The extent to which the solution is relevant to the given problem and follows the mathematical conventions.
